1150240.name: Automobilista - Donington Park
1150240.description:
One of the most internationally renowned and historically significant circuits in the world - host of Ayrton Senna´s famous first lap at the 1993 European GP to name one - Donington Park continues to host numerous major national and international events, having benefited from a multi-million pound reform prior to the 2018 season from new operator MSV.

The circuit's premier events include the British Touring Car Championship, British GT and F3, British Truck Racing, the Donington Historic Festival and the Classic Motorcycle Festival, with dozens of club car and bike meetings throughout the season.

The latest version of this classic track now features in Automobilista, based on LIDAR scan data for superior accuracy and featuring both GP and National layouts.
1150240.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
